summary: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.
cast: Richard Thomas|Ernest Borgnine|Donald Pleasence|Ian Holm|Patricia Neal|Paul Mark Elliott|David Bradley|Matthew Evans|George Winter|Dominic Jephcott|Mark Drewry|Colin Mayes|Ewan Stewart|Michael Sheard|Katerina Lírová|Mary Miller|Denys Graham|Marie-Noëlle Barre|Dominique Varda|Arda Brokmann|Mark Roemmich|Andrew Burleigh|Tomás Juricka|Drahomíra Fialková|Veronika Jeníková|Ken Hutchison|Stephen Reynolds|Ian Hastings|David de Keyser|Simon Hayword|Bruce Purchase|Paul Shearer|Kevin Stoney
keywords: war violence|trench warfare|world war one|hand to hand combat|bayonet charge
title: Sin novedad en el frente
